summary: This document is an email chain from October 2020 regarding the handling of signed warrant application materials related to the Epstein case. It involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and other personnel discussing the saving and inclusion of attachments in a discovery production folder.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the initial email attaching the signed warrant materials, working in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Email regarding signed Epstein warrant materials
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email with attached signed warrant application/affidavit materials related to Epstein, and colleagues discuss saving them to a shared drive and including them in discovery production.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated October 29, 2020, concerning the Epstein case.
It references signed warrant application/affidavit materials being handled by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The materials were to be saved on a shared drive and included in a discovery production folder.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal procedural work related to the Epstein investigation in late 2020.
